title: The Memory Keeper
description: Following up on the graffiti group, you're introduced to an elderly woman named Ora who was a child during the final years before the Scourge. She has detailed personal memories of Pre-Scourge Emberheart that historians believe to be priceless. But she is ill and her memories may not last much longer.

turns.narrative: Ora is sharp-minded but physically frail, housed in a modest home in the Temple District. She can describe the Pre-Scourge city block by block — the colours, the sounds, the people, the routines. She is not afraid to speak but has never been asked formally.
turns.choice_a: Arrange for Archive Researcher Winn to conduct proper oral history sessions with Ora immediately
turns.consequence_a: Winn arrives the next day with recording equipment. Ora speaks for three hours on the first session alone.
turns.choice_b: Simply listen to Ora yourself and take detailed personal notes
turns.consequence_b: You spend a full afternoon with Ora. Your notes capture twelve pages of vivid Pre-Scourge city life detail.

turns.narrative: Ora's memories include specific details about the Concordat's role in the city — temples, officials, beliefs, and critically, a building she calls 'the Listening House' which she says stood where the current Scourge-Fringe begins.
turns.choice_a: Investigate whether the Listening House location matches any existing Fringe maps
turns.consequence_a: Cross-referencing with Artificer Ollen's journal (if known) or standard maps shows a sealed Fringe structure that matches Ora's description perfectly.
turns.choice_b: Add the Listening House information to Ora's archive records for future research
turns.consequence_b: The detail is formally documented. It joins a growing body of 'Memory Keeper Archive' records.

turns.narrative: Ora wants to visit one specific location from her memories — the garden that used to stand where the Transit Corridor market now operates.
turns.choice_a: Escort Ora to the Transit Corridor and help her share her memory of the garden with those present
turns.consequence_a: A small crowd gathers. Ora describes the garden with such clarity several people begin crying.
turns.choice_b: Advise Ora that the journey may be too taxing given her health
turns.consequence_b: Ora agrees but asks that someone plant a single flower where the garden once stood. You do.

ora_escorted.description: Ora visited the old garden site. Community memory moment created.

flower_planted.description: A flower planted where the garden once stood.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.

conclusion: Ora visited the old garden site. Community memory moment created.
